replies.msg:
三四年機 :
i5 4460
GIGABYTE B85M G3
GTX960

想 upgrade 成 :
i5 9400F
ASUS H370M PLUS
GTX960 (舊機帶落嚟)

原因 : 舊機 i5 4460 4代U唔識分工俾顯卡, 所以睇 VR 4K H.265 好窒, 用mon仲窒, 要換U就要換埋板
目標 : 推 Dell Visor 睇 4K 5K 6K VRAV 上 60fps (大部份VRAV 60fps) (雖然 Dell Visor support 90fps)
問題 :
1) CPU用 i5 9400F 夠唔夠?
2) 唔超頻開蓋會唔會多餘?
3) 想用 Tt 隻 AiO 水冷(單風扇)會唔會多餘?(貪有型)
4) 有咩mATX板(support 9 gen)推介? 要多SATA(4個太少, 最好6個) (睇ASUS 網啲資料好多都唔準, 前後矛盾)
5) Z390M PLUS 貴 H370M PLUS $100, 是否應該要 Z390M PLUS?
6) price 網隻 HUH721212ALE600 有兩個款, 有咩分別?

感謝解答
顯

quote.msg: 顯

replies.msg: 你

Sorry, 係顯示卡
1) 我講開 display card, 不過要 press keyboard 12 個 buttons, 所以打兩個中文字代替
2) 我係從 mobile01 同埋睇開箱文而知道該兩個中文字係現在常用, 我亦無睇簡體字網頁習慣
3) Lihkg 版面無開 post 前必讀置頂文章警告有咩字唔用得
4) 有人回覆此post問題就最好, 無就請繼續玩接龍

VR 60FPS 最好RTX 2060
display card 級數同 FPS 成正比例
你可以換RTX 2060 睇吓FPS會唔會窒
換RTX 2060以上級數display card最好好部機upgrade

BTW
mobile01係台灣
Lihkg係香港

replies.msg:
Thanks!
我本身都想先換 Display Card 去解決
就開始睇 H.265 有關文章 (因為 4K, 5K, 6K 都係用佢)
但係睇到 6代U或以上先至可以用 GPU-accelerated decoding
即係俾 2080Ti你用, 4代U都唔識分工俾 Display Card
即係到時又要換埋 U 同板
咁不如換咗 U 同板先, 發揮新 U 個 GPU-accelerated decoding 優勢先
到時見 GTX960 有幾吃力先決定換咩 Display Card
話唔定唔洗換慳返, 反正唔打機, VR 又用唔著 Ray Tracing
所以先上嚟問 i5 夠唔夠
當然有錢直上3皮水冷一定得, 但會唔知道個真相係點

Here’s a quick rundown of well-known hardware that includes dedicated HEVC decoding blocks, which definitely support efficient HEVC playback:
Intel 6th-generation ‘Skylake’ Core processors or newer
AMD 6th-generation ‘Carizzo’ APUs or newer

感謝!

睇你出幾錢同有冇其他用途 齋 VRAV, 剪6K片
或想玩幾年都唔換機 我估 6K VRAV 應該興 5-6年, 之後興180度8K先再換

困擾問題 :
1) CPU用 i5 9400F 夠唔夠?
2) 唔超頻開蓋會唔會多餘?
3) 想用 Tt 隻 AiO 水冷(單風扇)會唔會多餘?(貪有型)
4) 有咩mATX板(support 9 gen)推介? 要多SATA(4個太少, 最好6個) (睇ASUS 網啲資料好多都唔準, 前後矛盾)
5) Z390M PLUS 貴 H370M PLUS $100, 是否應該要 Z390M PLUS?
6) price 網隻 HUH721212ALE600 有兩個款, 有咩分別?

replies.msg:
1) i5 9400F剪6K片冇問題 係你接唔接受到output時間長嘅問題

2) 超頻係你想超幾多同個溫度問題

3) AiO 水冷推薦240MM以上 120MM AiO 水冷會比同價位風冷廢

4) ASUS TUF Z390M-PRO GAMING
https://www.asus.com/hk/Motherboards/TUF-Z390M-PRO-GAMING/specifications/
有6個SATA 但M.2 SSD都算平同唔洗拉線會比SATA SSD更好
大多數Z390版都有2個M.2位 插2條1 TB M.2 SSD都有排玩

5) 如果你用K版CPU Z390會更有用

6) HGST在2011年3月由Western Digital收購 Western Digital未來不再使用HGST品牌名稱出硬碟
HGST Ultrastar 好似會改名做WD Ultrastar

replies.msg:
未呀, 今晚試重裝


同埋4代U(Haswell)係唔識 HEVC 10bit 硬解 (只識 HEVC 8bit 硬解)
5代U(Broadwell) 開始先有 HEVC 10bit 硬解

10bit hybrid HEVC decode is enabled on BDW U and H sku. Not available on HSW.
8bit hybrid HEVC decode is available on both HSW U sku and above and BDW U and H sku.
https://forums.intel.com/s/question/0D50P0000490MoXSAU/intel-iris-and-hd-graphics-driver-update-posted-for-haswell-and-broadwell-version-1536144080?language=en_US

5th Generation (Broadwell) Intel Core Processors with HD graphics 5500, HD graphics 6000, Iris graphics 6100 can do HEVC 10bit and 8bit
4th Generation (Haswell) Intel Core Processors with HD graphics 5000/4600/4400, Iris graphics 5100, Iris Pro graphics 5200 can do HEVC 8bit

I would suspect this is hybrid decoding.
Hybrid decoding is where decoding is offload from CPU to GPU and runs as a mixture of software & hardware decode on the GPU. My understanding is that HEVC is an extension of H.264 it shares many of the same features, so the GPU can use hardware decode where the require decode process is the same as H.264, however there will still be a significant amount of software decode still required to be run on the GPU.
I'm not sure if Kodi will be able to take advantage of this as it may require using the Quicksync interface to the GPU.
Full HEVC hardware decode is supposed to be coming with the next generation Skylake architecture.
https://forum.kodi.tv/showthread.php?tid=215305
